org.jbei.ice.lib.account

Class AccountController

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jbei.ice.lib.account.AccountController

  • public class AccountController
extends Object
    ABI to manipulate Account objects.

    This class contains methods that wrap AccountDAO to manipulate Account objects.

    Author:
    Timothy Ham, Zinovii Dmytriv, Hector Plahar

      • resetPassword

        public boolean resetPassword(String targetEmail)
        Reset a user's password
        Parameters:
        targetEmail - email address of user account to be changed
        Returns:
        true if the user account is found with email specified in the parameter and password for it is successfully reset, false otherwise

      • updatePassword

        public AccountTransfer updatePassword(String userId,
                                      long id,
                                      AccountTransfer transfer)
                               throws PermissionException
        Updates the specified user account's password
        Parameters:
        userId - email of user making change. If it is not the same as the email associated with the id, then this account must have administrator privileges
        id - unique (db) identifier for user whose password is to be changed.
        transfer - wrapper around new password
        Returns:
        updated account object
        Throws:
        PermissionException - if the account associated with userId and id are not the same but the userId does not have administrative privileges

      • createNewAccount

        public AccountTransfer createNewAccount(AccountTransfer info,
                                        boolean sendEmail)
        Creates a new account using the parameters passed. A random password is initially generated , encrypted and assigned to the account
        Parameters:
        info - contains information needed to create account
        sendEmail - whether to send account information (including password by email)
        Returns:
        generated password

      • createAdminAccount

        public Account createAdminAccount()
        Returns:
        new admin account

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getAccountId

        public long getAccountId(String email)
        Parameters:
        email - an account identifier (usually email)
        Returns:
        database identifier of account matching account identifier (email)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - for an invalid account identifier

      • isAdministrator

        public boolean isAdministrator(String userId)
        Check in the database if an account is a moderator.
        Parameters:
        userId - unique account identifier for user
        Returns:
        True, if the account is a moderator.

      • authenticate

        protected Account authenticate(String login,
                               String password,
                               String ip)
        Authenticate a user in the database.

        Using the IAuthentication specified in the settings file, authenticate the user, and return the sessionData

        Parameters:
        login -
        password -
        ip - IP Address of the user.
        Returns:
        the account identifier (email) on a successful login, otherwise null

      • authenticate

        public AccountTransfer authenticate(AccountTransfer transfer)
        Authenticate a user in the database.

        Using the IAuthentication specified in the settings file, authenticate the user, and return the sessionData

        Parameters:
        transfer - user information containing the email and password to be used for authentication If the sessionId field is set, it may or may not be used as the user's session id
        Returns:
        AccountTransfer

      • invalidate

        public void invalidate(String sessionKey)
        De-authenticate the given sessionKey. The user is logged out from the system.
        Parameters:
        sessionKey - unique session identifier
